meaningMnemonic: Let's take the <kanji>edge</kanji> and <kanji>discuss</kanji> it. That edge is the edge of getting married. But, when you reach that edge, before you jump over, you have to do a <vocabulary>marriage proposal</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
